title: Hextec crafting.
body: NA got there new crafting system, when do we get ours?

replies.body: gotta stock up that rp in preparation ! {{summoner:4}}

RIP all money I dont have.
And/or future money that I dont own yet.

I don't have an ETA as of yet; however, I can say with certainty that if there aren't any issues, Hextech Crafting should hit Oceania within the next few weeks. 

Check out the announcement for more information:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-na
